verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, before that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H4325>Behold<s%>, waters rise <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and shall be a <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>flood<s%>, and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and all that is in <S%H4393>it<s%>; the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and them that <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H120>it<s%>: then the men shall <S%H2199>cry<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl<s%>.

At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8161>stamping<s%> of the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H47>strong<s%> <S%H7494>horses<s%>, at the rushing of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and at the <S%H1995>rumbling<s%> of his <S%H1534>wheels<s%>, the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not look <S%H6437>back<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H7510>feebleness<s%> of <S%H3027>hands<s%>;

Because of the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7703>plunder<s%> all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon<s%> every <S%H5826>helper<s%> that <S%H8300>remains<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7703>plunder<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H339>country<s%> of <S%H3731>Caphtor<s%>.

<S%H7144>Baldness<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>; <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> is cut <S%H1820>off<s%> with the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of their <S%H6010>valley<s%>: how long will you cut <S%H1413>yourself<s%>?

<S%H1945>O<s%> you <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, how long will it be <S%H3808>before<s%> you be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>? put <S%H622>up<s%> yourself into your <S%H8593>scabbard<s%>, <S%H7280>rest<s%>, and be <S%H1826>still<s%>.

How can it be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>, seeing the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has given it a <S%H6680>charge<s%> against <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%>, and against the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>shore<s%>? there has he appointed <S%H3259>it<s%>.
